testcase.classname: End to end tests for ToolsQA's Book Store API
testcase.name: Authorized user is able to Add and Remove a book
testcase.system-out: Given I am "USERNAME" an authorized user in the "BASE_URL" URL..............passed Given A list of books are available in the "BASE_URL".......................passed When I "USER_ID" add a book to my reading list int the "BASE_URL"...........passed Then The book is added......................................................passed When I remove a book from my reading list in the "BASE_URL".................passed Then The book is removed in the "BASE_URL"..................................passed
